bill.summary: 10/21/1998--Passed Senate amended. Exempts from Federal taxation amounts paid by the United States to David R. Kaczynski of Schenectady, New York, and his wife, Linda E. Patrik, as a reward for information leading to the arrest of Theodore J. Kaczynski in the "Unabomber" case if all of the reward is used only to pay: (1) attorney's fees in connection with the "Unabomber case"; (2) State and local taxes; and (3) the remaining amounts to "Unabomber" victims and their families. Exempts from Federal taxation all such payments received by such victims and their families.
